attributes.action: Review the powers of The House of Lords & the inclusion of Bishops of the Church of England
attributes.additional_details:
The House of Lords is the second chamber of the UK Parliament.

They are unelected by the public and therefore I suggest that they should not have any responsibility with regards to the task of making and shaping the laws of the United Kingdom.

I also propose that the 26 bishops of the established Church of England who serve in the House of Lords should be removed in the best interest of the future of a multicultural state.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: House of Lords Religious Representation Reform

Created by: James O'Rourke

Closing: 11/11/2014
